HomePage.title: Welcome to Huaypo Adventure
HomePage.subtitle: Discover the magic of the Andes

Hero.title: Explore Machu Picchu, Sacred Valley, Rainbow Mountain, and the Best of Peru
Hero.subtitle: Travel in small groups and enjoy personalized tours crafted just for you!

Intro.title: Travel with confidence throughout Peru in <highlight>small groups</highlight> with <highlight>Huaypo Adventure</highlight>
Intro.description: At Huaypo Adventure, we believe travel goes beyond sightseeing—it's about feeling, learning, and connecting. We are a passionate team based in Cusco, dedicated to guiding you through authentic experiences: from the magical sunrise at Machu Picchu to the vibrant hues of Rainbow Mountain, and meaningful encounters with Andean communities. What sets us apart is *how* we do it—with heart, meticulously caring for every detail to ensure your adventure is unique. We know these paths as only locals can, and we want to share them with you as we would with a friend visiting our home. Ready to experience the real Peru? We welcome you with open arms and the best routes to discover.

AboutPreview.subtitle: Who We Are
AboutPreview.title: Huaypo Adventure: We Are Explorers, For Explorers
AboutPreview.p1: At Huaypo Adventure, we turn your dreams of exploring Peru into unforgettable memories. Driven by a passion for creating extraordinary travel experiences, we specialize in crafting exclusive trips for small groups and private parties.
AboutPreview.p2: Immerse yourself in Peru's vibrant culture, breathtaking landscapes, and ancient wonders, guided by our team of local experts dedicated to making your journey unique.

CustomTours.title: CUSTOM TAILOR-MADE TOURS & PACKAGES
CustomTours.p1: Imagine staying in a treehouse deep in the Amazon or feeding alpacas from your balcony jacuzzi with the Andes as a backdrop. At Huaypo Adventure, all our tours are fully customizable so you can design your dream Peru trip from scratch.
CustomTours.p2: From unique off-the-beaten-path experiences to carefully selected accommodations, transfers, and flights, we handle every detail. Contact us today to start planning your unique journey!

list.title: Beautiful views
list.text: Punctual and helpful, they made us feel safe always asking about our needs. We went to Moray on ATVs, visited the Maras Salt Mines, and stopped in Chinchero.
list.author: Francielle Tanamati

list.title: Incredible experience
list.text: Beautiful experience, super friendly treatment. They provided necessary information at all times, and paddleboarding in the lagoon was extraordinary. Thanks to Carlos and Juvenal.
list.author: Kelia L

list.title: Unforgettable tour!
list.text: Our Huaypo Adventure experience was excellent. Our guide was Carlos and driver Fabricio. It was an incredible experience, full of care and professionalism.
list.author: Aline

list.title: The best experience
list.text: Carlos provided excellent service without hesitation. They attended to us very well, and at all times, not only did they guide us, but they also helped take the best photos for memories.
list.author: Adriana C

Hero.title: About Us
Hero.subtitle: Meet the team behind your next adventure

Intro.title: Your Travel Agency for Unforgettable Tours and Adventures in Cusco
Intro.highlight: At Huaypo Adventure, our purpose is simple:
Intro.description: to transform your trip to Peru into a collection of authentic and memorable experiences. As your expert travel agency in Cusco, we are passionately dedicated to revealing the incomparable cultural richness and majestic natural beauty that this region and all of Peru offer.

guides.title: Our Local Guides Team
guides.desc: They are the heart of Huaypo Adventure. Expert professionals passionate about Peru's history and culture. They will not only show you the landscapes but also share the stories and traditions that make each destination unique.

drivers.title: Our Drivers Team
drivers.desc: Behind every successful adventure is the tireless effort of our transport team. With a smile and admirable disposition, they handle all logistics to make your trip safe, comfortable, and pleasant.

cooks.title: Our Local Cooks Team
cooks.desc: Gastronomy is essential. With skill and creativity, they prepare delicious and nutritious dishes using fresh local ingredients. Our cooks not only feed your body but give you a taste of the authentic flavor of our land.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc: We are a tour operator offering unique and authentic experiences in Peru, meeting the highest standards of quality and social responsibility.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.desc: By 2030, to be one of the most competitive and sustainable tourism companies in Cusco, providing quality and safe services to travelers worldwide.

honesty.title: Honesty
honesty.desc: We promote truth to build trust.

security.title: Security
security.desc: We guarantee our well-being and that of our clients.

respect.title: Respect
respect.desc: We value others, the environment, and our heritage.

Certifications.title: We are a fully authorized company

Intro.title: Code of Conduct against CSEC and our Commitment
Intro.description: At Huaypo Adventure, we are committed to promoting and carrying out joint actions to prevent and eliminate the Commercial Sexual Exploitation of Children and Adolescents (CSEC) in our services.

Content.title: Measures Adopted by Huaypo Adventure Against CSEC
Content.p1: At Huaypo Adventure, we are firmly committed to adhering to the Code of Conduct to combat the Commercial Sexual Exploitation of Children and Adolescents (ESNNA).
list1Items: Signing the Code of Conduct: As a travel agency and tour operator, we have signed the Code of Conduct against ESNNA with GERCETUR.
Stakeholder Adherence: All stakeholders involved in our operations (guides, cooks, drivers...) align with this commitment.
list2Items: Internal Training: We promote awareness among our entire team.
External Training: We extend this training to our stakeholders.
Content.list3Desc: In accordance with our values, no member participates in:
list3Items: The use of children and adolescents in pornographic activities.
Trafficking of children and adolescents for sexual exploitation purposes.
Content.final: At Huaypo Adventure, our mission is not only to offer unforgettable experiences but also to act as agents of social change.

Content.intro: Please read our data and privacy policies carefully. Our visitors are important to us, so we want you to be aware of our terms regarding the handling of your information.

sections.title: Comments
sections.content:
When visitors leave comments on the site, we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it.

sections.title: Media
sections.content: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

sections.title: Cookies
sections.content:
If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies.

sections.title: Embedded content from other websites
sections.content: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

sections.title: Who we share your data with
sections.content: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

sections.title: How long we retain your data
sections.content: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. For users that register on our website, we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile.

sections.title: What rights you have over your data
sections.content: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us.

Content.intro: Please read the following information carefully before booking your trip. These policies ensure transparency and safety for your experience with Huaypo Adventure.

sections.title: 1. Details required for booking
sections.content:
Please book once you have all details: names, passports, nationalities, and ages. If any member does not have a passport, please wait until they do.

Important: The name and passport number submitted will be printed on your travel permit. After purchase, we CANNOT change this data. Inca Trail wardens check this information strictly.

sections.title: 2. Arrival in Cusco and Acclimatization
sections.content: It is recommended to arrive in Cusco at least 2 days before departure for acclimatization and to make the final payment. Ideally, 3 days prior ensures better adaptation to the altitude.

sections.title: 3. Payments and Deposits
sections.content: A 50% deposit of the total amount is required when booking. Once received, we will send the confirmed services voucher within 24 hours for your approval.

sections.title: 4. Student Discounts
sections.content: Valid up to 25 years old with an Original Student ID (with photo, details, and expiration date). You must send us a clear scan when booking. If not sent on time or the original is not carried on the trip, the adult rate will apply.

sections.title: 5. Child Discounts
sections.content: Children under 16 receive a discount. You must send us a scan of the child's passport 3 days before accepting the booking.

sections.title: Modification Policies
sections.content:
• More than 30 days before: No penalty.
  • Between 15 and 30 days: 20% penalty.
  • Less than 15 days: 30% penalty.

Note for Inca Trail: Passport number changes are only allowed up to 5 days before.

sections.title: Cancellation Policies
sections.content:
• More than 30 days before: 15% penalty (administrative fees).
  • Between 10 and 30 days: 20% penalty.
  • Between 2 and 9 days: 50% penalty.

For Inca Trail (Strict):
  • More than 30 days: 50% penalty.
  • 15-30 days: 70% penalty.
  • Less than 15 days: 100% penalty.
